content: reaper leviathan crochet pattern skill level advanced materials required ❖ 4mm crochet hook us size g ❖ yarn needle scissors stitch markers ❖ fiberfill stuffing ❖ 16 gauge crafting wire for bendable skeleton wire cutters pliers ❖ 2 pairs of eyes - 14mm eyes and 10mm eyes i used plastic eyes for amigurumi ❖ dark gray or black yarn……… 20-25 yards 0 25 oz medium #4 worsted weight ❖ red yarn……… 40-45 yards 0 50 oz medium #4 worsted weight ❖ white or light gray yarn……… 90-100 yards 1 65 oz medium #4 worsted weight the yarn i used is bernat super value acrylic in colors dark grey cherry red and gray ragg if you re using a different size/brand yarn make sure all colors are the same size and kind of yarn for best results a reaper made with #4 yarn will be about 20 inches 51cm long when finished i recommend using medium #4 worsted weight size yarn or smaller for this project as a reaper made with anything thicker than #5 yarn will become quite large if your reaper s size is different than the one in pattern you ll need to adjust the size eyes you use if you re using plastic eyes 1 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said or sometimes the flo… front loops only number of stitches in the section turn… flip your work to go in the indicated opposite direction bold lettering… the stitch to do for that increase… increase 2 stitches in one space round decrease… decrease invisible decrease anything between brackets is the stitch or sequence of stitches to repeat the st… stitch sts = stitches indicated amount of times slip_stitch… slip_stitch x1… the necessary amount of times to space…… space repeat a sequence of stitches to complete a row/round chain…… chain ml… magic loop or magic_ring fasten_off… cut the yarn single_crochet… single_crochet additional information is in colored brackets half_double_crochet… half-double_crochet ❖ when a row has a color at the beginning of a row - red white or dark gray - that s the yarn color for that row/round and the following row until a color change is indicated ❖ to change colors for single_crochet photos right -> insert hook into next stitch yarn over and pull up a loop there should be 2 loops in the hook yarn over with new color and pull through both loops and continue pattern make sure to keep the gauge tight for both yarns during the color change so the
